title: SPE Chapter 00 - Introduction to Simple PHP Examples
description:
Introduction to Simple PHP Examples - a progressive PHP 8.5 micro-framework tutorial in 10 chapters. This video also explains the tutorial generation pipeline including TTS engine comparison.

This video covers:
‚Ä¢ Project overview and structure
‚Ä¢ Modern PHP 8.5 features (pipe operator, typed constants, enums)
‚Ä¢ GitHub repository tour
‚Ä¢ Running the project locally
‚Ä¢ How these tutorial videos are made
‚Ä¢ Piper TTS vs Google Neural2 comparison
‚Ä¢ Video generation pipeline and YouTube upload
